data.persona: I spend most of my time doing household chores. I want to find meaning in life. I am energetic and happy.
data.description:
You are in the South Forest.
The forest is lined with tall trees but has a long walkway for travelers. I the middle of the forest is a long river surrounded by tall grass with clear blue waters and lots of colorful fish.
The thief is here.

You are carrying a Laundry, and wearing a belt and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to beat the thief
data.mid_motivation: I dont want the thief to steal my basket today
data.long_motivation: I hope the thief is arrested in the coming weeks
